abstract: Insiders say Hillary Clinton's search for vice presidential pick appears to be focused on candidates who are strong in national security; shortlist includes Sen Tim Kaine, who serves on Senate Foreign Relations Committee, and James G Stavridis, retired four-star Navy admiral who served as 16th supreme allied commander of NATO.
lead_paragraph: The shortlist includes James G. Stavridis, a former NATO commander, and Senator Tim Kaine of Virginia, who is on the Senate Foreign Relations Committee.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Is Said to Seek National Security Experience for Vice Presidential Pick
headline.print_headline: Clinton Said to Focus  on National Security in Running Mate Pick

snippet: The shortlist includes James G. Stavridis, a former NATO commander, and Senator Tim Kaine of Virginia, who is on the Senate Foreign Relations Committee....
